Package com.xebisco.yield.render

Interface RenderMaster

All Superinterfaces:
AudioUtils, FileUtils, VisualUtils
public interface RenderMaster extends VisualUtils, AudioUtils, FileUtils
This is an interface to handle rendering, audio and files.
Since:
4-1.2

    • initGraphics

      This function returns a SampleGraphics object.
      Returns:
      A SampleGraphics object.

    • specificGraphics

      SampleGraphics specificGraphics()
      Returns a SampleGraphics object that contains the graphics for this sample.
      Returns:
      The specificGraphics method is being returned.

    • before

      void before(YldGame game)
      This function is called before the game starts
      Parameters:
      game - The game object.

    • initWindow

      SampleWindow initWindow(WindowConfiguration configuration)
      It creates a window
      Parameters:
      configuration - The configuration of the window.
      Returns:
      A SampleWindow object.

    • frameStart

      void frameStart(SampleGraphics graphics, View view)
      "This function is called once per frame, before the frame is rendered." The `graphics` parameter is a `SampleGraphics` object that you can use to draw things on the screen. The `view` parameter is a `View` object that you can use to get information about the current view
      Parameters:
      graphics - The graphics object that you can use to draw to the screen.
      view - The view object.

    • frameEnd

      void frameEnd()
      This function is called at the end of each frame, to the RenderMaster render the game.

    • canStart

      boolean canStart()
      Returns true if the game can start.
      Returns:
      A boolean value.

      float fpsCount()
      It returns the current FPS count.
      Returns:
      the number of frames per second.
